name: Sensor Web Server Helgoland API v3.4.0
body:
Available in [Maven Central](https://search.maven.org/search?q=g:org.n52.sensorweb-server.helgoland%20and%20v:3.4.0).

## Change Log 
* Make Jobs configurable via arctis-sea Faroe settings for full SOS integration

## Dependency Updates
* Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.3.1.RELEASE to 2.3.2.RELEASE (#524)
* Bump spotbugs-annotations from 4.0.6 to 4.1.1 (#525 )
* Bump jackson-annotations from 2.11.1 to 2.11.2 (#526)
* Bump arctic-sea.version from 7.6.1 to 8.0.0 (#527, ...)
* Bump version.spring from 5.2.6.RELEASE to 5.2.8.RELEASE

## Breaking Changes
* Move `org.n52.io.PreRenderingJob` to `org.n52.io.task.PreRenderingJob` (internally used)

See [here](https://github.com/52North/sensorweb-server-helgoland/compare/v3.3.0...v3.4.0) for the complete commit log.
